titles.title: Making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2007, and for other purposes.
Making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 2007, and for other purposes.
Continuing Appropriations resolution FY2007 (Second)

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Appropriations.
Mr. Lewis (CA) moved to suspend the rules and pass the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.J. Res. 100.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, read twice, considered, read the third time, and passed without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Amends the Continuing Appropriations Resolution, 2007 (Public Law 109-289, division B) to extend until December 8, 2006, specified continuing appropriations for FY2007.
